mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY S.USER_NO) AS RNUM, S.USER_NO, U.USER_NAME, S.STUDENT_GRADE, S.DEPARTMENT_NO, D.DEPARTMENT_NAME, U.USER_EMAIL, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_ROLE FROM STUDENT S JOIN TB_USER U ON S.USER_NO = U.USER_NO LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON S.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO ORDER BY S.USER_NO OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) AS SCOUNT FROM STUDENT

SELECT DISTINCT S.USER_NO, U.USER_NAME, S.STUDENT_GRADE, S.DEPARTMENT_NO, U.BANK_CD, U.USER_BANKNO, U.USER_EMAIL, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_ADD1, U.USER_ADD2, U.USER_REGNO1, U.GENDER, U.USER_ROLE, D.DEPARTMENT_NAME, C.COLLEGE_NAME, ACR.STATUS, S.STU_STATUS FROM STUDENT S JOIN TB_USER U ON S.USER_NO = U.USER_NO LEFT JOIN ACADEMIC_CHANGE_REQUEST ACR ON ACR.USER_NO = S.USER_NO LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON S.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO LEFT JOIN COLLEGE C ON D.COLLEGE_NO = C.COLLEGE_NO WHERE S.USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER SET USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, USER_TEL = #{userTel}, USER_ADD1 = #{userAdd1}, USER_ADD2 = #{userAdd2}, BANK_CD = #{bankCd}, USER_BANKNO = #{userBankno} WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}
